upgrade.0: On hit, increases ATK by 3.2% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by 12%.
upgrade.1: On hit, increases ATK by 3.9% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by 15%.
upgrade.2: On hit, increases ATK by 4.6% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by 18%.
upgrade.3: On hit, increases ATK by 5.3% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by 21%.
upgrade.4: On hit, increases ATK by 6% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by 24%.

upgrade.0: 命中敌人时自身攻击力提高3.2%，持续6秒，最高可以叠加7层。该效果每0.3秒最多触发一次。满层状态时伤害提升12%。
upgrade.1: 命中敌人时自身攻击力提高3.9%，持续6秒，最高可以叠加7层。该效果每0.3秒最多触发一次。满层状态时伤害提升15%。
upgrade.2: 命中敌人时自身攻击力提高4.6%，持续6秒，最高可以叠加7层。该效果每0.3秒最多触发一次。满层状态时伤害提升18%。
upgrade.3: 命中敌人时自身攻击力提高5.3%，持续6秒，最高可以叠加7层。该效果每0.3秒最多触发一次。满层状态时伤害提升21%。
upgrade.4: 命中敌人时自身攻击力提高6%，持续6秒，最高可以叠加7层。该效果每0.3秒最多触发一次。满层状态时伤害提升24%。

upgrade.0: 敵に命中した時、自身の攻撃力+3.2%、継続時間6秒、最大7重まで。0.3秒に1回のみ発動できる。7重まで発動すると与えるダメージ+12%。
